items.summary: Ensure the Exercise Info screen is visibly populated (non-empty) when opened from the Home card Info icon, using the existing EXERCISE_INFO_CONTENT mapping keyed by the exerciseId search param.

Adjust the Exercise Info layout and section styling to match the provided screenshot: title centered, a short intro paragraph, horizontal divider lines, and collapsible sections with uppercase headings (e.g., “BENEFITS”, “METHOD”) and a right-side chevron indicator reflecting open/closed state.

Update the dummy content structure for the “Equal Breathing” Exercise Info entry so it matches the screenshot’s section naming and content intent (at minimum: “BENEFITS” and “METHOD” with step-like instructions).

Add a bottom primary CTA button on the Exercise Info screen labeled “BEGIN EXERCISE” that starts the currently viewed exercise (navigates to /player with the corresponding breathing pattern and the user’s saved duration for that exercise).

Update the Exercise Info page header navigation control to use a close “X” icon (instead of the current back arrow UI) and ensure it correctly exits the Exercise Info screen when tapped (go back if browser history exists; otherwise navigate to Home).
